subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4500 is on the way
description_text:
Hello,

I recently bought plus x pedals set, wam pro transducers, and new HS
shifter.
I want also the new handbrake.
Cold you please send it woth the HS shifter alltogether to avoid extra
shipping costs?
Let me know how to proceed to get the handbrake please.

Thanks

Josep
